verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> to Me every <S%H3605><s%> first-born <S%H6363><s%>, the first offspring <S%H6363><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> womb <S%H7358><s%> among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> both of man <S%H120><s%> and beast; <S%H929><s%> it belongs to Me."

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Remember <S%H2142><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> you went <S%H3318><s%> out from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of slavery; <S%H5650><s%> for by a powerful <S%H2392><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out from this <S%H2088><s%> place. And nothing <S%H3808><s%> leavened <S%H2557><s%> shall be eaten. <S%H398><s%>
"On this day <S%H3117><s%> in the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib, <S%H24><s%> you are about to go <S%H3318><s%> forth. <S%H3318><s%>

"And it shall be when <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brings <S%H935><s%> you to the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> the Hivite <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite, <S%H2983><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers to give <S%H1><s%> you, a land <S%H5414><s%> flowing <S%H776><s%> with milk <S%H2100><s%> and honey, <S%H2461><s%> that you shall observe <S%H1706><s%> this <S%H5647><s%> rite <S%H2088><s%> in this <S%H5656><s%> month. <S%H2088><s%>

"For seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread, <S%H4682><s%> and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be a feast <S%H2282><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"Unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread <S%H4682><s%> shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> throughout the seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and nothing <S%H3808><s%> leavened <S%H2557><s%> shall be seen <S%H7200><s%> among you, nor <S%H3808><s%> shall any leaven <S%H7603><s%> be seen <S%H7200><s%> among you in all <S%H3605><s%> your borders. <S%H1366><s%>

"And you shall tell <S%H5046><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> on that day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'It is because <S%H5668><s%> of what <S%H2088><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> for me when I came <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>'

"And it shall serve <S%H1961><s%> as a sign <S%H226><s%> to you on your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and as a reminder <S%H2146><s%> on your forehead, <S%H996><s%> <S%H5869><s%> that the law <S%H8451><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> may be in your mouth; <S%H6310><s%> for with a powerful <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
"Therefore, you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> ordinance <S%H2708><s%> at its appointed <S%H4150><s%> time <S%H4150><s%> from year <S%H3117><s%> to year. <S%H3117><s%>

"Now it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brings <S%H935><s%> you to the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> as He swore <S%H7650><s%> to you and to your fathers, and gives <S%H1><s%> it to you,

that you shall devote <S%H5674><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> the first <S%H6363><s%> offspring <S%H6363><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> womb, <S%H7358><s%> and the first <S%H6363><s%> offspring <S%H7698><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H929><s%> that you own; <S%H1961><s%> the males <S%H2145><s%> belong to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"But every <S%H3605><s%> first <S%H6363><s%> offspring <S%H6363><s%> of a donkey <S%H2543><s%> you shall redeem <S%H6299><s%> with a lamb, <S%H7716><s%> but if <S%H518><s%> you do not redeem <S%H6299><s%> [it,] then you shall break <S%H6202><s%> its neck; <S%H6202><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> first-born of man <S%H120><s%> among your sons <S%H1121><s%> you shall redeem. <S%H6299><s%>

"And it shall be when <S%H3588><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> asks <S%H7592><s%> you in time <S%H4279><s%> to come, <S%H4279><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%>?' then you shall say <S%H559><s%> to him, 'With a powerful <S%H2392><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> us out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of slavery. <S%H5650><s%>

'And it came <S%H1961><s%> about, when <S%H3588><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was stubborn <S%H7185><s%> about letting <S%H7971><s%> us go, <S%H7971><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> killed <S%H2026><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> first-born <S%H6363><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> both <S%H4480><s%> the first-born of man <S%H120><s%> and the first-born of beast. <S%H929><s%> Therefore, <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> the males, <S%H2145><s%> the first offspring <S%H6363><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> womb, <S%H7358><s%> but every <S%H3605><s%> first-born of my sons <S%H1121><s%> I redeem. <S%H6299><s%>'

"So it shall serve <S%H1961><s%> as a sign <S%H226><s%> on your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and as phylacteries <S%H2903><s%> on your forehead, <S%H996><s%> <S%H5869><s%> for with a powerful <S%H2392><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> us out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about when Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> had let <S%H7971><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> did not lead <S%H5148><s%> them by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> even <S%H3588><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> it was near; <S%H7138><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Lest <S%H6435><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> change <S%H5162><s%> their minds <S%H5162><s%> when they see <S%H7200><s%> war, <S%H4421><s%> and they return <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

Hence God <S%H430><s%> led <S%H5437><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea; <S%H3220><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up in martial <S%H2571><s%> array <S%H2571><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the bones <S%H6106><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> with him, for he had made the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> solemnly <S%H7650><s%> swear, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> shall surely <S%H6485><s%> take <S%H6485><s%> care <S%H6485><s%> of you; and you shall carry <S%H5927><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> from here <S%H2088><s%> with you."
Then they set <S%H5265><s%> out from Succoth <S%H5523><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> in Etham <S%H864><s%> on the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was going <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%> to lead <S%H5148><s%> them on the way, <S%H1870><s%> and in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%> to give <S%H215><s%> them light, <S%H215><s%> that they might travel <S%H1980><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%> and by night. <S%H3915><s%>

He did not take <S%H4185><s%> away <S%H4185><s%> the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%> by day, <S%H3119><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>
